content.rendered:
Directed by Mohan Raja

Written by Lakshmi Bhupala. Murali Gopy. Mohan Raja

Cast Chiranjeevi (Brahma Teja / Godfather / Abram Qureshi). Salman Khan (Vettavaliyan Masoom Bhai). Nayanthara (Sathyapriya Jaidev). Satyadev Kancharana (Jaidev).Parth Siddhpura.Rehan Katrawale. Rajiv Kumar Aneja (Businessman). Mark Bennington (Lukas). Kundan Alexzed (Kundan). Sarvadaman Banerjee (PKR). Brahmaji (Bharath Naidu).Prabhu Deva. Gangavva (Kanthamma). Carl A. Harte (Agent Simon). Warina Hussain (Item number). Puri Jagannadh (Govardhan). Tanya S Ravichandran (Jhanvi). Sriram Reddy (Spy). Satish Saripalli (Business Man). Nawab Shah (Abdul). Murali Sharma (Narayana Verma (as Murli Sharma)). Sayaji Shinde (Naidu). Sunil (Ganesh). Divi Vadthya (Renuka)

Languages Tamil. Kannada. Malayalam. Telugu. Hindi

Producers R.B. Choudary. Shehraan Mohsin. Prasad N.V.. Shamiraah Nambiar. Vakada Appa Rao

Production Konidela Production Company. Super Good Films
